message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it holds for you. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I am willing to pay up to $1,100,000 for your product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value your interest, $1,100,000 is unfortunately still below my minimum acceptable price.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,125,000. This reflects the value you've expressed and allows for a mutually beneficial agreement.  Let's make this happen!

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand your position and respect the value of your product. However, based on my budget, I am unable to meet the $1,125,000 price point. I would like to propose $1,110,000 as a compromise. I hope this offers a path forward for us to reach an agreement.
